caller_intent: Abby is asking if she can continue her current AAA insurance policy until December 17th and start a new policy on that date, while adjusting the payment schedule to avoid being charged the full amount next month.
resolution_steps: Agent explains that if Abby cancels her current policy on the 30th, the payment will be pro-rated from December 17th to 30th.
Abby confirms she will not allow automatic payments until she follows up with the agent to confirm the first payment date.
Agent reassures Abby that the pro-rated amount will only cover the period from the 17th to the 30th.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy renewal and cancellation rules
AAA insurance policy terms and payment schedules
summary: Abby is adjusting her AAA insurance policy to align the expiration date with a new payment schedule. The agent explains pro-rating rules and confirms Abby will follow up before making any payments. The call ends with Abby agreeing to this approach.
